amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to terminate the NFIP by January 1, 2012 and allow States to form interstate compacts to provide insurance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 112-138 to terminate NFIP by January 1, 2012 and allow States to form interstate compacts to provide insurance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (MI) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 38 - 384 (Roll no. 560).

action.text: Amendment (A015) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mrs. Miller (MI).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
